My dear godfather and friend  
Piratini, November 20, 1841.

I have received your esteemed letter of the 16th of this month, accompanied by the official document for Dutra, which I will deliver to him as soon as possible; it seems unnecessary to thank you for this favor, because there have been so many I have received that I think I may already have tired you, yet nevertheless I do not give up, confident in your benevolent spirit and in how much you strive to be useful not only to your friends but to all humanity; I am certain I will proceed to that place as soon as Your Excellency

They say that Father Chagas is going there to reside as Pro.cor, which took quite some effort to decide; there is much complaint about Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency  

Your goddaughter sends you a hug, as well as to my esteemed godmother. Your godmother and I commend ourselves greatly to you, as do Dona Custodinha, Bruto, and the rest of the family.

Of Your Excellency  
Antônio José de Abreu
